attributes.action: get rid of all of the horses in the New Forest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
all they do is get in the was of the paths and smell horrible. they are ugly creatures and on my regular walks in the ol' forest, have been known to chase my amigoes. 
 they should be replaced by the more docile and loving cow. cows are better looking creatures, and stick to the areas off the paths.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
